name: The Maze of Malazzar
description:
The legends talk about the great treasure that is on the other side of the maze of Malazzar. Countless brave adventurers have tried to claim the treasure but none could do so. Enter Watashi - a twenty something year old guy already drowned in debt. He decides to find the treasure for he doesn't have anything to lose. Or.. has he?

Controls:

Move = arrow keys

Attack = z

Interact = Enter

Pause menu = Esc

The Maze of Malazzar is a pixel-art based horror game designed by an engineering student who loves horror and video games both.
